subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: At the Nets’ first media day in Brooklyn, Coach Avery Johnson expressed his excitement about the expectations for his squad, which perhaps had the best off-season of any N.B.A. team.
snippet: At the Nets’ first media day in Brooklyn, Coach Avery Johnson expressed his excitement about the expectations for his squad, which perhaps had the best off-season of any N.B.A. team.
